text: Michael Robert DeLuise (born August 4, 1969) is an American actor, movie director, and movie producer. In 1990, DeLuise starred on the Fox TV series 21 Jump Street as Joey Penhall. He also appeared on Gilmore Girls, NYPD Blue, CSI: NY, Lost, and Stargate SG-1. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles
title: Michael DeLuise
